summary: Completed comprehensive testing of customer portal features including ticket tracking, customer replies, and navigation links. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI functional with minor issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Allows customer replies on closed tickets
minor_bugs.impact: Customers can reply to closed tickets when they shouldn't be able to
minor_bugs.note: Backend doesn't check ticket status before allowing replies

authentication_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: Track Your Ticket link in success modal has overlay blocking clicks
ui_bugs.workaround: Use footer 'Track Existing Ticket' link instead

passed_tests: Track ticket page loads correctly at /track-ticket
Ticket search with valid credentials works
Ticket search with invalid credentials shows proper error
Ticket details display correctly (status, priority, conversation)
Closed tickets hide reply section correctly
Customer reply API works with valid credentials
Customer reply API returns 404 for invalid credentials
Footer 'Track Existing Ticket' link navigates correctly
Error handling and toast notifications work

medium_priority: Fix modal overlay issue preventing 'Track Your Ticket' link clicks in SupportTicketModal success state
Consider adding backend validation to prevent customer replies on closed tickets
low_priority: Update unauthorized endpoint to return 401 instead of 403 for consistency
